resources.string: Printer is not responding. Please check it is powered on and available at %1$s
Couldn\'t read document to be printed
The printer name cannot be empty
Couldn\'t find printer, is it available?
Couldn\'t query printer status: socket timeout. Please check network connectivity.
Couldn\'t query printer status: unknown host. Please check network connectivity.
Couldn\'t query printer status: network unreachable. Please check network connectivity.
The printer name was not found on the server (HTTP 404). Please check its name.
Couldn\'t check job #%1$d status because the connection with the CUPS server was reset
Couldn\'t find job #%1$d, is it already finished?
Couldn\'t print document: socket timeout. Please check network connectivity.
Failed to connect to the printer

This app is a receipt printer driver for Android. For more information on supported receipt printers, see the website.

This program is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 3 as published by the Free Software Foundation.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the GNU General Public License for more details.

This software is based on Android CUPS print driver by Benoit Duffez. Further details about it may be found at https://benoitduffez.github.io/AndroidCupsPrint.
The source code for this program can be found in a Git repository hosted at Debian Salsa at the following URL: https://salsa.debian.org/andrewsh/escpos-android.
